tool.name: Pairwise.seqs
tool.description: calculate uncorrected pairwise distances between sequences
tool.command: mothur_wrapper.py --cmd='pairwise.seqs' --result='^mothur.\S+\.logfile$:'$logfile,'^\S+\.dist$:'$out_dist --outputdir='$logfile.extra_files_path' --fasta="$fasta" --align="$align" #if len($calc.__str__) > 0: --calc="$calc" #end if "$countends" #if float($cutoff.__str__) > 0.0: --cutoff="$cutoff" #end if #if $scoring.setby == 'user': --match="$scoring.match" --mismatch="$scoring.mismatch" --gapopen="$scoring.gapopen" --gapextend="$scoring.gapextend" #end if #if len($output.__str__) > 0: --output="$output" #end if --processors=\${GALAXY_SLOTS:-8}

param.name: align
param.label: align - Select a pairwise alignment method

param.name: calc
param.label: calc - Calc Method - Gap Penality
param.option: onegap - counts a string of gaps as a single gap

param.name: cutoff
param.label: cutoff - Distance Cutoff threshold - ignored if not > 0
param.help: Do not save any distances larger than this, a common value would be 0.10

param.name: setby
param.label: Scoring match, mismatch, gapopen, and gapextend

param.name: match
param.label: match - Pairwise alignment reward for a match

param.name: mismatch
param.label: mismatch - Pairwise alignment penalty for a mismatch

param.name: gapopen
param.label: gapopen - Pairwise alignment penalty for opening a gap

param.name: gapextend
param.label: gapextend - Pairwise alignment penalty for extending a gap

tool.help:
@MOTHUR_OVERVIEW@
.. _Mothur: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Main_Page
**Command Documenation**
The pairwise.seqs_ command will calculate uncorrected pairwise distances between sequencesi as a column-formatted_distance_matrix_ or phylip-formatted_distance_matrix_.
.. _column-formatted_distance_matrix: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Column-formatted_distance_matrix .. _phylip-formatted_distance_matrix: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Phylip-formatted_distance_matrix .. _pairwise.seqs: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Pairwise.seqs
